section.title: The List Tax Authority Parties screen.
section.para: This screen list any parties that have been associated with a tax authority and tax rate. To have any tax calculated for Sales Orders or Purchase Orders then an entry must exist for 'Company'.
Entries can also be created, updated or deleted.

section.title: How do I add a new Tax Authority Party Info?

listitem.para: Press the 'New Tax Authority Party Info' button
Enter or use the lookup to select the 'Party Id'
Leave the 'From Date' blank (NOTE: Default will be current date and time)
Enter the 'Party Tax Id' if required (NOTE: This can be VAT or GST number)
Use the drop down box to select whether the party select is 'Tax Exempt'
Use the drop down box to select whether the party selected is 'Nexus' (See note below)

section.para: NOTE: 'Nexus' is a term that refers to an agreement for between the tax authority and potential tax payer that the tax authority can impose the tax. This is usually for Sales Tax. If you have a Sales Tax that is uniformly applied to a product or range of products then the 'Nexus' field can be set to 'Y'

section.title: How do I update a Tax Authority Party Info?

listitem.para: Press the 'Edit' button next to the entry that needs to be amended

section.title: How do I delete a Tax Authority Party Info?

listitem.para: Press the 'Delete' button next to the entry that needs to be deleted
